entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as having a 'smoky, shadowy form' and his face becomes 'livid with fear'.

entities.name: james potter
entities.description: James Potter is described as being 'tall and untidy-haired like Harry'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having a similar appearance to James Potter.

relationships.description: Voldemort's form is described as being 'smoky, shadowy' and similar to James Potter.
Harry is mentioned as having a similar appearance to James Potter.
